ac: 22, touch 15, flat-footed 18 (+6 armor, +1 deflection, +3 Dex, +1 dodge, +1 natural)
special_attacks: channel positive energy (DC 17, 6d6), smite evil 4/day (+2 attack and AC, +11 damage)

spells.paladin spells prepared:
(CL 8th; concentration +10)

3rd-prayer

2nd-delay poison, resist energy

1st-bless, divine favor, lesser restoration

feats: Combat Expertise, Dodge, Improved Critical (elven curve blade), Mobility, Spring Attack, Whirlwind Attack
gear: +2 chain shirt, +1 elven curve blade, masterwork longbow with 20 arrows, amulet of natural armor +1, belt of giant strength +2, cloak of resistance +1, ring of protection +1, silver holy symbol, 319 gp

sections.body:
Before Combat The paladin casts delay poison and resist energy (fire).

During Combat The paladin uses Mobility, Spring Attack, and Whirlwind Attack to engage and destroy multiple opponents at once. He normally uses his divine bond to give his weapon the flaming and holy special abilities, but if his foes are spread out, he gives it speed instead.

Base Statistics Without resist energy, the paladin's statistics are

Immune charm, disease, fear, sleep

Resist none.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: An elven honorblade guards pristine forests and hunts evil beasts that would despoil nature.

sections.url: pfsrd://NPC Codex/Rules/Core Class NPCs/Paladin/Paladins/Elven Honorblade/Jatha Ventoth

sections.body: Jatha champions the benign nature spirits. He spends his time patrolling his beloved forests, chasing unicorns, and conversing with treants. When danger threatens his home, he has the charisma necessary to unite the creatures of the woods into an army of focused chaos.
Jatha might attack the PCs if he believes they or foes that pursue them are a threat to his home or the creatures within it. He attempts to use detect evil before attacking.
Jatha engages in mock battles with mischievous sprites, possibly leading the PCs to think he is under attack.

sections.name: Jatha Ventoth

special_qualities: aura, code of conduct, divine bond (weapon +3, 2/day), elven magic, lay on hands (5d6, 7/day), mercies (poisoned, sickened, staggered), weapon familiarity
name: Elven Honorblade
skills: Diplomacy +10, Heal +3, Knowledge (nature) +3, Perception +11, Stealth +12, Survival +4
aura: courage (10 ft.), justice (10 ft.), resolve (10 ft.)
